overview:
Ryo is a entrepreneur who possesses a multi-cultural background with strong industry experience in mobile/smartphone business and online marketing. Ryo has been involved with J-Seed since 2005, participating in several of J-Seedâ€™s partner companies including Sozon, Mobikyo, Maneo, Piku and was in charge of starting up the businesses, marketing and business development. In 2010, at TrafficGate (now merged with LinkShare Japan K.K., A Rakuten, Inc. Group Company), was in charge of starting up an iPhone ad network and a voice recognition search iPhone App in Japan. In 2011, as a angel investor, co-founded the first and largest group buying aggregate site in Japan. In addition, currently sit as a advisor for several startups for overseas investment and alliances.

Ryo sometimes writes about venture companies and overseas market news for CNET Japan and TechWave. Loves working with start-ups and in addition to being an avid blogger, a serious networker who is constantly meeting people and hooking them up with others.

Ryo was selected as a Leaders of Tomorrow at the 40th St. Gallen Symposium held in 2010 and in 2011 as a member of WEF Global Shapers Community (GSC) in Japan.
